Background

Cheng-Chun (Jedd) Yang 楊承濬

Software Design Senior Engineer at Delta Electronics 台達電子軟體設計資深工程師
(+886) 961350607 | yangjedd@gmail.com

Bio

Jedd is currently a R&D software design senior engineer at Delta Electronics. He received his MEng from National Tsing Hua University with his thesis titled "Developing Stabilized Material Point Method for Free Surface Flow Modeling". He is currently focusing on software infrastructure of physics-based simulation for robotics applications.

Research Area

Computational Mechanics, Robotic Manipulation, Physics-Based Deformable Body Simulation

Work Experience

Software Design Senior Engineer, Delta Smart Manufacturing (DSM), Delta Electronics, Taiwan (Full-time), Apr 2025 -- Present

Education

M.Eng., Power Mechanical Engineering, National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan, Sep 2022 - Aug 2024
  • Honorable Mention Award in NTHU College of Engineering Student Competition(2024).
  • Honorary Member of The Phi Tau Phi Scholastic Honor Society of the Republic of China (2024).
B.S., Interdisciplinary Program of Nuclear Science, National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan, Sep 2018 - Jun 2022
  • Second Place Award in Interdisciplinary Program of Nuclear Science Independent Study Competition (2021).
  • Honorable Mention in Chinese Society of Mechanical Engineers (2021).
